comment: Smart Data Models - WindContPType3IEC adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/WindContPType3IEC/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. P control model Type 3.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.5.3.

contents.name: WindDynamicsLookupTable
contents.comment: The P control type 3 model with which this wind dynamics lookup table is associated. Default: 'list'

contents.name: WindGenTurbineType3IEC
contents.comment: Wind turbine type 3 model with which this Wind control P type 3 model is associated. Default: None

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dpmax
contents.comment: Maximum wind turbine power ramp rate (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dtrisemaxlvrt
contents.comment: Limitation of torque rise rate during LVRT for S (d). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kdtd
contents.comment: Gain for active drive train damping (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kip
contents.comment: PI controller integration parameter (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpp
contents.comment: PI controller proportional gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mplvrt
contents.comment: Enable LVRT power control mode (M true = 1: voltage control false = 0: reactive power control.  It is project dependent parameter. Default: False

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: omegaoffset
contents.comment: Offset to reference value that limits controller action during rotor speed changes (omega). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pdtdmax
contents.comment: Maximum active drive train damping power (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rramp
contents.comment: Ramp limitation of torque, required in some grid codes (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tdvs
contents.comment: Timedelay after deep voltage sags (T). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: temin
contents.comment: Minimum electrical generator torque (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: tomegafilt
contents.comment: Filter time constant for generator speed measurement (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: tpfilt
contents.comment: Filter time constant for power measurement (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: tpord
contents.comment: Time constant in power order lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: tufilt
contents.comment: Filter time constant for voltage measurement (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: tuscale
contents.comment: Voltage scaling factor of reset-torque (T). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: twref
contents.comment: Time constant in speed reference filter (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: udvs
contents.comment: Voltage limit for hold LVRT status after deep voltage sags (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: updip
contents.comment: Voltage dip threshold for P-control ().  Part of turbine control, often different (e.g 0.8) from converter thresholds. It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: wdtd
contents.comment: Active drive train damping frequency (omega). It can be calculated from two mass model parameters. It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: zeta
contents.comment: Coefficient for active drive train damping (zeta). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
